Fabric is a little thin, but perfect for spring and fall  or layering. I am 5 foot 4- 180 pounds chest size 38 with a C – D cup. Fabric is a little on the thin side (not see-through, but definitely requires a bra). The lace is only topstitched on, rather than embedded in a seam, so I do anticipate it eventually tearing or coming apart, but for $5 I’m very happy with it. The color (green) is as pictured and it fits well.

This is a nice, cute, basic top. The trim adds a little extra style to it.  The fit is generous; I bought large because I wanted some extra room, but the medium would have been fine (36/33/40). The sleeves have ample length for my long arms, and the material is soft and comfortable.

This shirt is your basic black long sleeved T. It is somewhat fitted and not oversize. The lace detail  around the v-neck and wrists gives it a bit of prettiness so it's a little less plain. The fabric is comfortable and lightweight. I found the fit ran slightly small so would suggest ordering a size up if you don't want the shirt to feel tight.

This is a nice lightweight shirt. I feel it is more for layering but you could wear it alone. The lace detailing at the neckline is feminine and adds to the style of the shirt. It is a soft cotton and has a bit of stretch. It did not fit loose but more of a body skimming fit. I will pair it wish a cardigan or shacket. Great price for a basic wardrobe piece
I love this top. The material is really nice and sizing was perfect!
The sizing is accurate to the chart and the shirt fits nicely. It is comfortable and flattering. The lace detail is pretty.

评论概述: Love it, lightweight but not sheer.
评论详情: This lace V-neck blouse is adorable and matches the image perfectly. While it's a bit snug for a large, I'd recommend sizing up if you prefer a looser fit. The shoulders might feel a bit restricted, but it's not overly small. The lace adds a charming touch to the basic black V-neck. The material is lightweight and not sheer, making it ideal for fall.

This long sleeve shirt is thinner than I expected. The material is very lightweight. The lace on the neck and sleeves is soft and reminds me of the camis we were under everything in 2005. I think this shirt will work well under a cardigan or shawl/wrap.

I got this shirt in Sky Blue, size Large. I’m 5’8”, 132 lbs., and typically wear a Medium. However, according to the size chart, the measurements on the medium seemed a bit small, so I opted for the large. It fits perfectly in the shoulders and bust area, but it’s a bit big through the waist and hips. It doesn’t look too baggy, just definitely a front tuck shirt. The color is gorgeous, and is heathered. It’s extremely soft and will be so comfy to wear. It’s a poly/rayon/spandex blend so it should wash well with minimal shrinkage. The length of 26” will be perfect to wear with leggings and the sleeves are plenty long for my long arms.  The lace is beautiful and is stretchy around the wrists, so I can push up my sleeves. The v-neck is perfect. The workmanship is excellent and I appreciate the lovely way it was packaged, without shrink wrap. This is really a pretty shirt, with the lace trim accenting an already great long sleeve top. Just be aware of the sizing..the medium would have been too small, and the large is just a tad big. Can’t wait to wear it.

Online this was a really cute shirt. I am not usually a lace person, but the shirt looked nice enough that I thought it would add a detail to some of my outfits. In person, I am disappointed in the shirt. I ordered black, which online looks like a lighter heather black. In person this is straight up flat black, which loses some of the interest. The fit is also strange. It is supposed to be a loose fit. I ordered a size medium, which is normally a loose fit for me. The shirt is tighter in the bust and arms but loose everywhere else. If you are bigger busted or have any muscle in your arms, this isn't going to fit quite right.
I like the fit, and the lace details. I am a ladies size 10/12 and I’m tall, and the sleeves are plenty long. I took one star because the fabric isn’t particularly soft however, It is a quality top.

评论概述: AUTOMET Long Sleeve Shirts for Women Lace V Neck Basic Casual Tops Loose Fit Fall
评论详情: This shirt fits true to size I ordered the XXL.  The color is as it is in the advertisement.  There were no odd odors or discolorations to the shirt I received.  The lace gives it a cuteness and adds femininity to it.  The sleeves seem a little long but I think that's the lace and that the shirt is supposed to fit loose.  It's easy to fix the length so no big deal just felt it needed to be mentioned.  I really like that this shirt is casual but can be dressed up with the right accessories like a belt, maybe a silky scarf, or an antique looking brooch.  Overall very happy with this shirt that is comfortable and easy to wear in the fall and spring seasons.
